entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of rain after midnight and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain mixed with snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
